meaning: brush up, reject, exclude, eliminate, bone plectrum

onyomiExamples.meaning: spring (e.g. coil, leaf), mainspring, power spring
plectrum, pick, drumstick for Japanese drums (e.g. taiko)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to hit (e.g. to have a car hit someone), to run into, to reject, to deny, to refuse, to eliminate, to exclude, to leave out, to flip, to splash, to splatter, to decapitate, to behead, to jump up, to point or curl up (e.g. ends of hair)
